sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"特性，特点，品质"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: quality, property, feature, characteristic, peculiarity, trait, attribute, character
means: quality ： 最普通用词，既可指有形或无形的特性，又可指个性或共性的特征。
property ： 多指同类事物所共有的特性，一般不用于指人。
feature ： 指事物突出引人注目的特点。多用来说明人的容貌特征或地理特征。
characteristic ： 指某人或某物天生有别于他人或他物的内部特质或外表特征。
peculiarity ： 指人或事物独具的或奇怪的特点，常带感情色彩。
trait ： 多指人的性格、心情的特征，尤指先天秉赋的持久的行为模式或性格特征。
attribute ： 通常指人主观赋予某事物的属性，可指典型事物。
character ： 多指一类人或事物所具有的独特的典型的特征。

word_mean: 可以作为标志的显著特点。

sentence.Network_en: The most arresting feature is the painted wall decoration.
sentence.Network_cn: 最醒目的特点是绘有图画的墙面装饰。

sentence.Network_en: Wanton violence is now becoming a regular feature of urban life.
sentence.Network_cn: 肆无忌惮的暴行在城市生活中越来越司空见惯。

sentence.Network_en: Television companies tend to censor bad language in feature films.
sentence.Network_cn: 电视公司往往会在审查故事片时删去其中的粗话。

这类报道还包括新闻特写(news feature)，它有时被称作辅文（sidebar），是为配合有时效性的新闻事件所作的。例如，在一起飞机失 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally denoting the form or proportions of the body, or a physical feature): from Old French faiture 'form', from Latin factura (see facture)

entry.def: A feature of something is an interesting or important part or characteristic of it.

example.ex: Patriotic songs have long been a feature of Kuwaiti life...
example.tran: 爱国歌曲长期以来一直是科威特生活的一个特色。

example.ex: The spacious gardens are a special feature of this property...
example.tran: 大花园是这处房产的特色。

entry.def: Your features are your eyes, nose, mouth, and other parts of your face.

example.tran: 他的容貌似乎有所改变。

entry.tran: 由…主演;以…为主要内容;重点介绍
entry.def: When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it.

example.ex: It's a great movie and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year...
example.tran: 这是一部精彩的影片，主演是一位西班牙演员，他不出一年就会成为国际巨星。

example.ex: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games...
example.tran: 这个时长一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍最近比赛的精彩片断。

entry.tran: 出演重头戏;担任主演;(在展览、杂志中)为重点推出的部分
entry.def: If someone or something features in something such as a show, exhibition, or magazine, they are an important part of it.

example.ex: Jon featured in one of the show's most thrilling episodes.
example.tran: 乔恩主演剧中最引人入胜的剧集之一。

entry.tran: (报刊或杂志的)特写，专题;(电台或电视台的)特别节目
entry.def: A feature is a special article in a newspaper or magazine, or a special programme on radio or television.

example.ex: We are delighted to see the Sunday Times running a long feature on breast cancer.
example.tran: 我们高兴地看到《星期天时报》发表了有关乳腺癌的长篇专题文章。

example.ex: ...a special feature on the fund-raising project.
example.tran: 有关集资项目的专题报道

entry.def: A feature or a feature film or movie is a full-length film about a fictional situation, as opposed to a short film or a documentary.

example.ex: ...the first feature-length cartoon, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.
example.tran: 第一部卡通长片《白雪公主和七个小矮人》

entry.tran: 地理特征;地形地物;地貌
entry.def: A geographical feature is something noticeable in a particular area of country, for example a hill, river, or valley.

sentences.sentence: "the map showed roads and other features"
"generosity is one of his best characteristics"

means.word_mean: 2. the characteristic parts of a person's face: eyes and nose and mouth and chin;

sentences.sentence: "an expression of pleasure crossed his features"

means.word_mean: 3. the principal (full-length) film in a program at a movie theater;
4. a special or prominent article in a newspaper or magazine;

sentences.sentence: "they ran a feature on retirement planning"

means.word_mean: 5. an article of merchandise that is displayed or advertised more than other articles

sentences.sentence: "This restaurant features the most famous chefs in France"

means.word_mean: 2. wear or display in an ostentatious or proud manner;

stems_affixes.word_buile: de向下+feat做,制作→做下去→打下去

feat做,制作+ure→做事的状态,特征
mal坏+feas=feat做,制作+ance表名词→做坏事
de向下+feat做,制作→做下去→打下去
feat做,制作+ure→做事的状态,特征

Sentence.sentence: The special features can add $25,000 or more to the purchase price of a house
However,if your bond does not have features hat make it attractive to other investors, you may be forced to sell your bond at a discount i.
Such features are easily written into the software.
Such features arc easily written into the software

sentences.en: The island's chief feature was its beauty.
sentences.cn: 这个岛的主要特色是风景秀丽。

sentences.en: The veil she was wearing obscured her features.
sentences.cn: 她戴的面纱遮掩了她的面容。
日夜服务是这家商店的特色。

means.word_mean: 特写；(书刊)特载；(电影)由…主演；以…为号召物

sentences.en: The magazine is featuring his articles.
sentences.cn: 这杂志正在特载他的文章。

sentences.en: Can you feature wearing a necktie here?
sentences.cn: 在这样的地方打着领带你能想像吗?

sentences.en: All the brothers feature their father.
sentences.cn: 所有兄弟的相貌都与他们的父亲相似。

means.word_mean: [美国英语]起重要作用；作为主要角色，主演

sentences.en: The latest popular actress is featured in this new film.
sentences.cn: 这位最近走红的女演员在这部新影片中主演重要角色。

jushi.chinese: 这个岛的主要特色是风景秀丽。

jushi.english: The magazine will be running a special feature on environment next week.
